tickets.title: Add user authentication
tickets.description: Implement JWT-based authentication with login and logout endpoints. Include refresh token rotation and secure cookie storage.

tickets.title: Create user profile API
tickets.description: Build REST API endpoints for user profile CRUD operations. Include validation with Zod schemas and proper error handling.

tickets.title: Fix memory leak in websocket handler

tickets.description: Convert CommonJS require statements to ES module imports. Update package.json type field and ensure all imports use proper extensions.

tickets.title: Add integration tests for auth flow
tickets.description: Write integration tests covering login, logout, token refresh, and session invalidation. Use test database and mock external services.
